verbs.description: His coal renaissance [V: is] crashing . Rule rollbacks are tangled in court . His push for heavier polluting cars is resisted by even auto companies . But even so , a year after Trump pulled out of the Paris Accord , prospects for slowing global warming have dimmed considerably .

[ARG1: His coal renaissance] is [V: crashing] . Rule rollbacks are tangled in court . His push for heavier polluting cars is resisted by even auto companies . But even so , a year after Trump pulled out of the Paris Accord , prospects for slowing global warming have dimmed considerably .

But even so , a year after Trump pulled out of the Paris Accord , prospects for slowing global warming have dimmed considerably .
